statements: SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp, fuel_level, speed, engine_temperature FROM vehicle_performance_metrics;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_performance_metrics WHERE speed > 100;
SELECT vehicle_id, MAX(engine_temperature) AS max_engine_temp FROM vehicle_performance_metrics GROUP BY vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_performance_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_level, speed FROM vehicle_performance_metrics WHERE fuel_level < 50 AND speed > 80;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_performance_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT vehicle_id, engine_temperature FROM vehicle_performance_metrics WHERE speed > 100 ORDER BY engine_temperature ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_level, speed FROM vehicle_performance_metrics WHERE engine_temperature BETWEEN 80 AND 100 ORDER BY speed DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_performance_metrics WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY fuel_level DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, speed, engine_temperature FROM vehicle_performance_metrics WHERE fuel_level < 50 ORDER BY engine_temperature DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM VehicleMetrics
SELECT vehicle_id, metric_name FROM VehicleMetrics WHERE metric_value > 50
SELECT MAX(metric_value), MIN(metric_value) FROM VehicleMetrics
SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(*) FROM IssueLogs GROUP BY vehicle_id
SELECT * FROM IssueLogs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM VehicleMetrics WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM VehicleMetrics WHERE vehicle_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM IssueLogs GROUP BY vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM VehicleMetrics WHERE metric_value > 100 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT vehicle_id, issue_description, reported_by FROM IssueLogs ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT id, timestamp, speed FROM VehicleMetrics WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT engine_temperature, rpm FROM EngineHealth WHERE vehicle_id = 2 ORDER BY engine_temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM FuelConsumption WHERE fuel_level > 0.5 AND fuel_consumed < 10;
SELECT id, engine_temperature, rpm FROM EngineHealth WHERE rpm > 2000;
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp, speed, engine_temperature FROM VehicleMetrics WHERE speed >= 80 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM VehicleMetrics WHERE id = 1;
SELECT timestamp, speed FROM VehicleMetrics WHERE engine_temperature > 80;
SELECT vehicle_id, MAX(speed) AS max_speed FROM VehicleMetrics GROUP BY vehicle_id;
SELECT VehicleMetrics.*, FuelConsumption.fuel_level FROM VehicleMetrics JOIN FuelConsumption ON VehicleMetrics.id = FuelConsumption.vehicle_id;
SELECT em.oil_level, eh.engine_temperature FROM EngineHealth eh JOIN EngineHealth em ON eh.vehicle_id = em.vehicle_id WHERE eh.rpm > 2000;
SELECT * FROM VehicleMetrics;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_level, speed FROM VehicleMetrics WHERE fuel_level > 50;
SELECT engine_id, coolant_temperature FROM EngineStatus WHERE coolant_temperature < 80;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_used, distance_traveled FROM FuelConsumption ORDER BY distance_traveled DESC;
SELECT issue_id, detection_time, vehicle_id, issue_description FROM IssueDetection WHERE vehicle_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM VehicleMetrics WHERE speed > 100 ORDER BY engine_temperature DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_level FROM VehicleMetrics WHERE fuel_level < 0.5 AND speed < 60;
SELECT engine_id, oil_pressure FROM EngineStatus WHERE oil_pressure > 30 ORDER BY engine_id;
SELECT * FROM FuelConsumption WHERE fuel_used > 50 AND distance_traveled > 1000;
SELECT detection_time, issue_description FROM IssueDetection WHERE detection_time > NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY ORDER BY detection_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM VehicleInfo;
SELECT vehicle_id, manufacturer, model FROM VehicleInfo WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT manufacturer, model FROM VehicleInfo ORDER BY manufacturer, model DESC;
SELECT * FROM EngineMetrics WHERE engine_temperature > 80 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT vehicle_id, MAX(tire_pressure) AS max_tire_pressure FROM TireMetrics GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING max_tire_pressure > 30;
SELECT * FROM VehicleInfo LIMIT 10;
SELECT manufacturer, model, year FROM VehicleInfo WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, engine_temperature, fuel_level FROM EngineMetrics WHERE engine_temperature > 80 AND fuel_level < 50;
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp, tire_pressure, tire_temperature FROM TireMetrics WHERE tire_pressure > 34 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM BatteryMetrics WHERE status = 'LOW' OR status = 'CRITICAL' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
